about_the_game:
Serve your sentence with style in this exclusive supporter pack

This pack comes with:

In-game cosmetics:

  • Special Rat Skin
  • Carpet (Cell Decor)
  • Bigger window showing more space (Cell Decor)
  • String Lights (Cell Decor)
  • Flower Pot (Cell Decor)
  • Glowing Skull (Cell Decor)

Out-game elements

  • Digital OST of the game
  • Wallpapers
  • Digital Posters
  • Emojis

And also a huge thanks from Wooden Alien!

Note: The digital posters, game soundtrack and wallpapers will be directly downloaded at the root of your Space Prison game folder. Access your local folder of the game to get the files once you've purchased this supporter pack.
